title: 820-3115 No green Light  ,but turn on with battery .
message:
hello guys, this is my first post!! sorry my english
820-3115 No green Light  ,but turn on with battery

PPBUS_G3H 12.57v
SMC_BC_ACOK oscillates 0.6-0.8v


CHGR_ACIN 3.9v
CHGR_DCIN 16.75v
SMC_RESET_L 3,3v
CHGR_RST_L 3.4v
In cap c7050 5ohm
In cap c7020 25ohm
I try new u7000 and still nothing

-Diode Mode reads
SMC_BC_ACOK 0.5v
SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SCL 0.5v
SMBUS_SMC_BSA_SDA 0.5v

THANKS FOR THE HELP

title: 820-3115 No green Light  ,but turn on with battery .
message:
First of all, welcome to the forum!

Does the machine turns on with charger alone, without battery?
Check R5087 integrity.

title: 820-3115 No green Light  ,but turn on with battery .
message:
Thanks for the welcome i´m happy to be here


the board dont turn on from the charger, i´ts 85w original
R5087 -450k , 
all the board is clean , no sign off water damage

title: 820-3115 No green Light  ,but turn on with battery .
message:
OK, remove the battery; we need to make it turn on with charger alone first.

Check resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28; on the chip, not over the corresponding caps (discard broken traces/solders).
Post some basic voltages for U7000; pins 1, 2, 3, 9, 12, 13, 14, 15, 17, 19, 20, 27.

Did you try to start in SMC bypass mode?

title: 820-3115 No green Light  ,but turn on with battery .
message:
Good morning
Yes is turning on in SMC bypass mode! No green light still

All the reads are onli whit the charger.
U7000
Resistance pins 17/18       5 ohm
Resistance pins 27/28      25ohm
1       0.003v
2.      16.62v
3.       4v
9.       0.033v
12.     3.4v
13.      3.4v
14.      0.8v
15.      3.4v
17.       12.57v
19.       5v
20.       5v
27.       16.57v

Edit
i recheck all and now ppbus fall to 12.27v , all the previus reads are the same instill pin 17=12.27v

title: 820-3115 No green Light  ,but turn on with battery .
message:
"15.      3.4v"
Are you sure about this?
Check again resistance between pins 17/18; just between chip pins.
Resolder these pins.
